mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM `CBIB` c WHERE c.CBIB02 = #{storeId} AND c.CBIB08 = #{goodsId}
ORDER BY c.CBIB04 DESC limit 1 for update

SELECT
FROM `CBIB` c WHERE
c.CBIB08 = #{goodsId} ORDER BY c.CBIB04 DESC limit 1

SELECT
FROM `CBIB` c WHERE
c.CBIB08 = #{goodsId} and c.CBIB02 = #{whId} and c.CBIB17 = "直接入库" ORDER BY c.CBIB04 DESC limit 1

SELECT count(*) FROM `CBIB` c WHERE
c.CBIB08 = #{goodsId} and c.CBIB02 = #{whId} and c.CBIB17 = "直接入库" ORDER BY c.CBIB04 DESC limit 1

SELECT sum(c.CBIB11) as num FROM `CBIB` c WHERE
c.CBIB08 = #{goodsId} and c.CBIB02 = #{whId} and c.CBIB17 = "直接入库"

SELECT sum(c.CBIB13) FROM `CBIB` c WHERE
c.CBIB08 = #{goodsId} and c.CBIB02 = #{whId} and c.CBIB17 = "销售出库单"

SELECT
FROM `CBIB` c WHERE c.CBIB08 = #{goodsId} and c.CBIB02 = #{whId} ORDER BY c.CBIB04 DESC limit 1

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.CBIB04,'%Y-%m') as yearAndMonth, SUM(a.CBIB13) as outCountTotal,SUM(a.CBIB14) as outMoneyTotal FROM CBIB a left join CBCA ca on ca.CBCA01 = a.CBIB19 WHERE a.CBIB05 = 5 and a.CBIB19 is not null GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.CBIB04,'%Y-%m') HAVING 1=1

SELECT sum(a.qty) as qty, a.goods_id as goodsId from
gs_goods_sku a GROUP BY a.goods_id
